headline: Real NFL Data Powers EA SPORTS™ Madden NFL 26 to New Heights Featuring All New QB DNA and Coach DNA
summary: REDWOOD CITY, Calif., June 04, 2025--Electronic Arts Inc. (NASDAQ: EA) and EA SPORTS™ today unveiled EA SPORTS™ Madden NFL 26, launching worldwide on August 14, 2025, for PlayStation®5, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC via EA app for Windows, Steam, and Epic Games Store. Powered by a new AI-driven machine learning system trained on nearly a decade of real NFL data, Madden NFL 26 introduces QB DNA and Coach DNA, delivering authentic quarterback behaviors and adaptive coaching strategies
